infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ShopHub needs camera access to take product photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ShopHub needs photo library access to upload product images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ShopHub uses your location for delivery estimation.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Allow ShopHub to track your activity for analytics and personalization.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ShopHub to access your photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ShopHub to access your camera.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ShopHub to access your location.
